channel.title: Excited on Laments of the Struggling Researcher
channel.description: Recent content in Excited on Laments of the Struggling Researcher

item.title: Hugo is nice!
item.author: sumitros@gmail.com (Sumitro Bhaumik)
item.description: This is my first post in this site (Technically) Since I am not the sharpest tool in the shed, I needed to try out Hugo for an entire afternoon to make it work properly. I had some difficulty in understanding how to setup the custom themes. Then I had the brilliant idea of moving the theme.toml file to the Hugo directory and lo, the site was created properly! This theme that I’m using is called Hyde-y, which is extremely clean, Material-designed, and hopefully responsive.
